item.title: Charlamagne tha God 对 @JonKarl 说，"没有人受到 2024 年总统大选的启发"，"没有人愿意看到 "总统拜登和前总统特朗普之间可能进行的复选。
item.description: Charlamagne tha God told @JonKarl that "nobody is inspired" by the 2024 presidential election and "nobody wants to see" the likely rematch between Pres. Biden and former Pres. Trump. trib.al/3NJvshE

item.title: 尼基-海利谈唐纳德-特朗普在俄罗斯反对派领袖阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼去世后的沉默："要么他站在普京一边，认为普京杀了他的一个政治对手很酷，要么他认为这没什么大不了的"。
item.description: Nikki Haley on Donald Trump's silence following the death of Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny: "Either he sides with Putin and thinks it's cool that Putin killed one of his political opponents, or he just doesn't think it's that big of a deal." trib.al/reC5Fa4

item.title:
宾夕法尼亚州的一名法官被指控谋杀未遂和严重伤害罪，据称她在分居的男友熟睡时开枪击中了他的头部。
当局称，她的前男友现在一只眼睛失明。
阅读更多
item.description:
A Pennsylvania judge is charged with attempted murder and aggravated assault after allegedly shooting her estranged boyfriend in the head as he slept.

Authorities say her ex is now blind in one eye.

Read more: trib.al/vItjZoZ

item.title: 根据新的联邦数据，半数州以及纽约市和华盛顿特区的呼吸道病毒活动频繁。
item.description: Half of all states — plus New York City and Washington, D.C. — are seeing high levels of respiratory virus activity, according to new federal data. trib.al/azDAS9f

item.title:
R to @ABC："奥本海默》共获得七项英国电影学院奖，巩固了其在下月奥斯卡颁奖典礼上的领跑者地位。
"穷途末路》（Poor Things）获得五项大奖，大屠杀题材影片《利益地带》（The Zone of Interest）获得三项大奖。
更多信息
item.description:
“Oppenheimer” won a total of seven BAFTAs, cementing its front-runner status at next month’s Oscars.

“Poor Things” took five prizes and Holocaust drama “The Zone of Interest” won three.

Read more: trib.al/PO6WgrN

item.title:
"奥本海默》于周日获得英国电影学院奖最佳影片，西里安-墨菲（Cillian Murphy）凭借原子弹之父一角获得最佳男演员奖。
艾玛-斯通因《可怜的事》中贝拉-巴克斯特一角获得最佳女演员奖。
item.description:
“Oppenheimer” won best picture at the British Academy Film Awards on Sunday, with Cillian Murphy winning the best actor prize for his role as the father of the atomic bomb.

Emma Stone was named best actress for her role as Bella Baxter in “Poor Things." trib.al/du7XTd3

item.title: 乌克兰军队已从阿夫迪夫卡撤出，这是美国在提供更多军事援助问题上陷入僵局后第一个沦陷的乌克兰城市。
item.description: Ukrainian troops have withdrawn from Avdiivka, the first Ukrainian city to fall since U.S. became deadlocked in sending more military aid. trib.al/DeXtvqR

item.title: 当局称，英格兰西南部发现三名儿童死亡，一名妇女因涉嫌谋杀被捕。
item.description: Woman arrested on suspicion of murder after three children found dead in southwest England, authorities say. trib.al/WmsW0C7

item.title: 长期以来，科学家们一直在假设，随着冰层以前所未有的速度不断融化，北极地区的北极熊数量将会发生什么变化。现在，他们有证据表明，随着冰层的消失，北极熊将很难找到食物。
item.description: Scientists have long hypothesized what would happen to polar bear populations in the Arctic as ice continues to melt at unprecedented rates. Now, they have evidence of just how hard it will be for polar bears to find sustenance as the ice disappears. trib.al/bp4HdXo

item.title: 官员称，明尼苏达州两名警察和一名消防员在接到家庭报警后丧生。
item.description: Two police officers, one firefighter killed after responding to a domestic call in Minnesota, officials say. trib.al/3GOM9z0

item.title: 罗德岛男子因涉嫌在以黑人为主的教堂纵火而面临联邦指控。
item.description: Rhode Island man faces federal charges for allegedly setting fires at predominantly Black church. trib.al/7wJx3RN

item.title:
当肯塔基州的一名校车司机把车开到一名学生的校车停靠站时，他看到这名一年级学生很沮丧。
当他发现是因为这个小男孩没有为睡衣日准备衣服时，司机知道下一步该怎么做了。
item.description:
When a Kentucky school bus driver pulled up to a student's bus stop, he saw the first-grader was upset.

When he found out it was because the young boy didn’t have an outfit for pajama day, the driver knew just what to do next.

trib.al/jrfzbg7

item.title: 阿肯色州一辆警车在高速追逐一辆据称是偷来的 U-Haul 货车时，车内的警官采取了 PIT 机动措施，导致警车侧翻。
item.description: Dramatic footage shows an Arkansas police cruiser flip over after the officer behind the wheel performed a PIT maneuver while being led on a high-speed chase by two men in an allegedly stolen U-Haul van. trib.al/Q7FZPz7

item.title: 法国天文学家瓦莱里-莱尼（Valéry Lainey）和巴黎天文台的一个研究小组宣布发现了米马斯新形成的海洋。
item.description: French astronomer Valéry Lainey and a team of researchers from Observatoire de Paris announced the discovery of Mimas' newly formed ocean. trib.al/aLXaME3

item.title: 当局告诉 @ABC 附属机构 @WSBTV 说，两名男子在佐治亚州一家加油站制造了一起抢劫案，企图偷走 5,000 美元，目前正面临重罪共谋指控。
item.description: Two men are facing felony conspiracy charges after they staged a robbery at a Georgia gas station in an attempt to steal $5,000, authorities told @ABC affiliate @WSBTV. trib.al/JkaJnjl

item.title: 乔尔-奥斯坦（Joel Osteen）在其位于休斯顿的湖木教堂发生枪击事件后的首次周日礼拜中讲道，祈求 "恢复和治愈"。
item.description: Joel Osteen preached for "restoration and healing" in the first Sunday service following the shooting that erupted at his Lakewood Church in Houston. trib.al/oEfknXo

item.title: 埃博妮-庞西（Eboni Pouncy）在休斯顿被警方误认为是入侵者而遭到枪击，她告诉 @ABC 新闻，在她意识到发生了什么之前，她看到了 "墙上的洞"。
item.description: Eboni Pouncy, who was shot by police in Houston after they mistook her for an intruder in her own home, told @ABC News she saw "holes in the wall" before she realized what was happening. trib.al/bUh0bQU

item.title:
"我们无意中建立了一个宣传引擎的世界"
专家说，OpenAI 视频生成器 Sora 有可能助长宣传和偏见。
item.description:
"We've inadvertently built a world of propaganda engines."

OpenAI video-generator Sora risks fueling propaganda and bias, experts say. trib.al/6nIcLmK

item.title: 官方称，在弗吉尼亚州房屋爆炸中丧生的志愿消防员身份已经确认，他名叫特雷弗-布朗（Trevor Brown），现年 45 岁，是三个孩子的父亲。
item.description: The volunteer firefighter killed in a Virginia house explosion has been identified as Trevor Brown, a 45-year-old father of three, officials say. trib.al/pUaSCSI

item.title: 法官宣布俄亥俄州前副警长因枪杀小凯西-古德森（Casey Goodson Jr.
item.description: Judge declares mistrial in former Ohio deputy's murder case over fatal shooting of Casey Goodson Jr. trib.al/rgky2R5

item.title:
在圣彼得堡，人们看到俄罗斯反对派领导人阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的纪念碑上的鲜花被移走，但悼念者很快又将鲜花取而代之。
自纳瓦尔尼去世以来，已有数百人因参加纪念纳瓦尔尼的集会和聚会而被拘留。
item.description:
Flowers seen being removed from a memorial for Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny were swiftly replaced by mourners in St. Petersburg.

Hundreds have been detained in connection with rallies and gatherings in honor of Navalny since his death. trib.al/LALk3V9

item.title: 官方称，周日在明尼苏达州伯恩斯维尔，两名警察和一名消防员在接到 "一个家庭处于危险之中的报警 "后被枪杀。
item.description: Two police officers and one firefighter were shot and killed in Burnsville, Minnesota, on Sunday after responding to a "call of a family in danger," officials say. trib.al/2GhnE23

item.title: 乔尔-格林伯格（Joel Greenberg）曾是众议员马特-盖茨（Matt Gaetz）的密友，他正在配合众议院道德委员会对这位佛罗里达州众议员的调查。
item.description: Joel Greenberg, a one-time close friend of Rep. Matt Gaetz, is cooperating with the House Ethics Committee probe into the Florida congressman, sources tell ABC News. trib.al/dI2Okpg

item.title: 前亚利桑那州惩教所所长查尔斯-瑞安（Charles Ryan）因对 2022 年在亚利桑那州坦佩（Tempe）家中发生的持械对峙事件中扰乱治安行为的指控无异议而被判缓刑。
item.description: Former Arizona Corrections Director Charles Ryan has been sentenced to probation for his no-contest plea to a disorderly conduct charge stemming from a 2022 armed standoff at his Tempe, Arizona, home. trib.al/T2CkDyH

item.title: 本月早些时候，一位幼儿园教师与未婚夫结婚，她知道她想与她的第二个家庭--她在明尼苏达州任教九年的学校的学生和教职员工--分享这一特殊时刻。
item.description: When a kindergarten teacher married her fiance earlier this month, she knew she wanted to share the special event with her second family — the students and staff at the Minnesota school she has been teaching for the last nine years. trib.al/P1A5N8z

item.title: 尼基-黑利（Nikki Haley）将重点放在非共和党人可以投票的初选州，并将目标锁定在仍然绝大多数支持前总统特朗普的共和党基础选民之外的选民。
item.description: Nikki Haley is focusing on primary states where non-Republicans can vote — and targeting voters outside of a GOP base that still overwhelmingly favors former Pres. Trump. trib.al/9XzNV7x

item.title: 早在 OceanGate 潜水器在前往泰坦尼克号残骸的途中不幸发生内爆之前，一名前雇员就曾警告公司高管，他们的船体设计和公司的测试方法效率低下。
item.description: Years before an OceanGate submersible tragically imploded on its way to the wreckage of the Titanic, a former employee warned company executives about the inefficiency of their hull design and the company's testing methods. trib.al/vvWFM5X

item.title: 在马萨诸塞州失踪大学生莫拉-穆雷（Maura Murray）神秘失踪 20 周年之际，警方公布了她的最新年龄照片，希望能从中找到新的线索。
item.description: A new age progression photo has been released of missing Massachusetts college student Maura Murray in an effort to prompt new leads on the 20th anniversary of her mysterious disappearance. trib.al/eGi70Ra

item.title: 警方宣布，在印第安纳州两名妇女相隔数天被刺死并在附近被发现的 "残忍而邪恶 "的谋杀案中，一名嫌疑人已被逮捕。
item.description: A suspect has been arrested in the "brutal and evil" murders of two Indiana women who were both stabbed to death days apart and found near each other, police announced. trib.al/pSKPUek

item.title:
军事行动升级迫在眉睫，加沙儿童放飞风筝。
他们说，对这些孩子来说，放风筝可以分散他们对拉法帐篷城生活现实的注意力。
item.description:
Children in Gaza fly kites as military escalation looms.

For these children, they said flying kites is a distraction from the reality of life in Rafah's tent city. trib.al/sPqBaeZ
